speaker: Expulsion
lines: The Archmage's staff does not tap. The kettle does not boil.
Paperwork rustles itself into a shape that isn't your shape anymore.
A clerk coughs an apology into a sleeve and files it.
The door learns your footsteps so it can forget them later.
A raven cannot find a ribbon that fits this occasion and leaves.
In the courtyard, a fountain keeps applauding because it doesn't know.
Your robe hangs differently. It will pass to a friend and fit them.
You step beyond the gate with a key you should bury and won't.
The wind is very gentle about it.

give_item.name: Refusal Sigil
give_item.description: Protects you from doors that want to like you
